thread.title: U.S. Begins Identifying Al-Qaeda Contacts Discovered in Yemen Raid
thread.title_full: U.S. Begins Identifying Al-Qaeda Contacts Discovered in Yemen Raid

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: U.S. Begins Identifying Al-Qaeda Contacts Discovered in Yemen Raid
text:
An Overwhelming Number of Voters DEMAND Democrats Work With Trump 
President Donald Trump previously came under fire for that raid, during which Navy SEAL Chief Petty Officer William “Ryan” Owens . Critics called the raid “unnecessary” and were quick to judge its outcome. 
However, Vice President Mike Pence told “CBS This Morning” on Wednesday that he believed the victory of gaining such intelligence would lead to future victories for the U.S. 
“Secretary Mattis, as recently yesterday, confirmed again to the administration that there was significant intelligence that was gathered that will lead to American success and to the safety and security of the American people,” Pence said.   
“This was a strike directed at obtaining information about Al Qaeda operating out of Yemen. We do believe it will lay a foundation for victories in the future,” he said. 
And Trump himself addressed the raid during his first speech at a joint session of Congress. 
During his speech , President Trump stated: “I just spoke to our great Gen. Mattis, just now, who reconfirmed that — and I quote —‘Ryan was a part of a highly successful raid that generated large amounts of vital intelligence that will lead to many more victories in the future against our enemies.’ Ryan’s legacy is etched into eternity.” 
Chief Petty Officer Owens did not die for naught, no matter what the mainstream media might want you to believe. If even the leftist hacks at CNN are willing to admit the value of the raid during which he died, you know there’s no denying it.
